quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.
Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities.
He who can take advice is sometimes superior to him who can give it.
There is one thing about being President, no one can tell you when to sit down.
Little minds have little worries, big minds have no time for worries.
Life is easier than you'd think; all that is necessary is to accept the impossible, do without the indispensable, and bear the intolerable.
To garden is to let optimism get the better of judgment.
Let us all be happy and live within our means, even if we have to borrow money to do it.
If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees.
